      • addToMutProbGene

        public static void addToMutProbGene(BiomorphGenome genome,
                                    int summand)
        Add a quantity to the mutProbGene. If the the result is less than one, it is set to one. If the result is greater than 100, it is set to 100.
        Parameters:
        summand - the quantity to add to the MutProbGene.

      • addToGene

        public static void addToGene(BiomorphGenome genome,
                             int index,
                             int summand)
        Gene9 is not permitted to fall below 1, or rise above 8 (the default, for Colour.) Monochrome sets 11 as the limit in its constructor.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the gene to be modified
        summand - the quantity to add to the gene.
